item.title: You can save $30 on the OnePlus Watch 3, a great Galaxy Watch 8 alternative
item.description: OnePlus has kicked off its back-to-school sale, and the deals are pretty solid. There are discounts on the company’s impressive tablets, but the highlights are the new low prices on its smartwatches.
